docs.lead_paragraph: Saluted by welcoming blasts from all the shipping in the harbor the North German Lloyd liner Grosser Kurfurst, carrying 105 of the survivors of the burned steamship Volturno of the Uranium Line, steamed up to her pier in Hoboken at noon yesterday.

headline.main: BOATS LEAKED, HOSE BAD, SAY VOLTURNO MEN; Kurfuerst Here with 105 Survivors and Tales of Terror on Burning Ship.

docs.abstract: Volturno survivors on Grosser Kurfurst say vessel gave little aid
docs.snippet: Saluted by welcoming blasts from all the shipping in the harbor the North German Lloyd liner Grosser Kurfurst, carrying 105 of the survivors of the burned steamship Volturno of the Uranium Line, steamed up to her pier in Hoboken at noon yesterday.
